docs.lead_paragraph: CLAIM -- Sharks are attracted to bright colors and sometimes mistake divers for seals. THE FACTS -- You would never know it from the evening news, but the last thing you should worry about at the beach this summer is a shark attack. The odds of drowning are far greater. Yet despite the attention they receive, shark attacks and their causes are widely misunderstood, experts say.
